deployLendingPool(address).custom:security: Only authorized addresses should be able to call this function
deployLendingPool(address).details: Deploys a new lending pool with specified parametersen

returns._0: Address of the newly deployed lending pool

setFactory(address).custom:security: Only the owner should be able to set the factory address
setFactory(address).details: Sets the factory address for the deployer

params.factory: Address of the lending pool factory

deployLendingPool(address).notice: This function creates a new lending pool instance

setFactory(address).notice: This function configures the factory reference for the deployer
